ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 1   +   1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 2   +   1/2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1   +   1/2 cups whole-milk ricotta cheese, 1 cup white sugar,   +   3/4 cup unsalted butter, softened, 3 large eggs, at room temperature, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons almond extract, 4  fresh figs, chopped into 1/2-inch pieces, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 4  fresh fig slices, 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar, or as needed (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 24%, Saturated Fat 11g 55%, Cholesterol 103mg 34%, Sodium 421mg 18%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 16%, Dietary Fiber 2g 6%, Total Sugars 27g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 1mg 4%, Calcium 190mg 15%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 181mg 4%
